title: BATMAN Baby Boys' DC Comics Footies Size 6-9M
features: Mini caped crusaders can sport the most batty look around in this super cute onesie mimicking Batman's costume
In Batman's signature black and yellow this all in one pajama is ideal for all superheroes in training and future competition of The Joker
The cosy envelope neckline, cuffs on the sleeves and popper fastening make this sleepsuit extra cosy and will be popular with parents too
description: Baby Boys DC Comics Batman sleepsuit. Your little caped crusader can sport the most batty look around in this fun and adorable superhero one piece pajama. Featuring bright and bold graphics of the Batman logo and his belt that mimick Batman's costume, as well as embroidered badges on the footies and right sleeve, this onesie is perfect for little ones growing up to be the Jokers ultimate competition. The envelope neckline and popper fastening are cosy and make dressing and changing really easy.
